channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Australia’s startup scene has delivered the 3rd-highest liquidity behind the U.S. and China, new analysis shows
item.description: Australia has produced 1.5 unicorns for every $1 billion of VC investment, compared to 0.6 for China and 1.1 for Israel and the U.S.
